name: Another One Loops the Dust - Original
name_original: Another One Loops the Dust - Original
description:
Another One Loops the Dust 

After an exhausting day at work you just want to relax and listen to some music. You set up your record player and let it do its work. Sadly, your home is a mess and  full of dust so that the song starts to slow down and ruin the mood. But there's hope: Hansel the Hamster! Can he save the day or will the song stuck in an endless loop of disappointment?!

How to play 

  • You should play with sound 
  • Move with left mouse button 
  • Switch tool with right mouse button

Clean up dust with the broom and scratches with the hammer. Try cleaning up the record, before dust or scratches hit the needle. Dust will slow it down and scratches will make the needle jump.

Team 

  • Emil (limered) - Special Effects, Programming 
  • Michi (ryupold) - Special Effects, Programming 
  • Stefan - Cool music 
  • Helen - Design, Animations, Programming 
  • Sven (justsWn) - Programming, Sound

Software 

  • Unity 
  • Some graphic programs 
  • Visual Studio

Music 

  • "Take on Me" by a-ha remixed by Stefan 
  • 20 seconds loop from "Shooting Stars" by Bag Raiders slightly altered by us

(All rights belong to their respective owners.)

We hope you enjoy cleaning the record and having a song loop inside your head! Greetings from Germany :-)
